title: Kalista and her Martial Poise
body: The new patch that allows Kalista to re target a target when basic attacking seems to have also affected her Martial Poise. This isent a problem when holding shift and right clicking but when u right click manuelly and then right click to leap and repeat the process it seems to not leap half the time. I dont know if this is a problem with timing her basic attacks but this never happend to me before the new patch rolled out. Anyone else having the same problems?

replies.body:
The same thing is happening to me.
Making me mad that i can only leap half of the time, it is really frustrating.
Messing my gameplay up so so much.
I want to try the newly buffed kalista so badly, but sadly can't even play a single game due to the firewall error lol.
Even the pro player Sneaky says that Kalli is bugged so i guess im not the only one having the same problem
I'm not too sure, I'll get to you once I fix my client. I hope it didn't do that, to be resetting her animation if you select a new target.
